raw_body:
GLADYS PUSHPARANY MATHIAPARANAN,​ – Safe in the Arms of Jesus. Dearly beloved wife of S.S. Mathiaparanan,​ much loved mother of Sumathy & Rajan and Sumanthiran & Savithri,​ beloved grandmother of Shamanthi,​ Sanjayan,​ Shiloh,​ Shechem and Shalem,​ the precious daughter of A.V. & Lily Ponnu of Kudathanai,​ Point Pedro and the much loved sister of the late Devi Nallarulanantham,​ Alan Jeyarajah (Canada),​ C.P. Jeyasingam (Singapore),​ P. Jeya Sundaram (Germany) and Pushpashanthy Ponnu (Sri Lanka). She was also the loving sister-in-law of the late Nallarulanantham,​ Alice Thamu (UK),​ Mangalanayaki Navaratnarajah (UK) and S.S. Pooranampillai (Australia),​ Rathy Jeyarajah,​ Rubini Jeyasingam and Ranjini Jeya Sundaram. Remains will be open for viewing at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. on Thursday,​ the 29th of February and from 9 a.m. on the 1st of March,​ followed by a service at the Parlour at 4 p.m. on the 1st of March 2024. Burial at the General Cemetery Kanatte,​ Borella at 5 p.m.
014363
